name: NeonLanes(prototype)
description:
THIS IS A PROTOTYPE, don't expect much of it!

You are the ship in the bottom. Your goals is to follow every move the ship from the top is doing. You can only go left or right with your keyboard.

Update 0.3

- Added a few graphics, including a "neon" glow effect

My goal for this game is to make a very simple two buttons (maybe 3) "infinite racing game", with rhythm elements (hence the potentiel 3rd button). I also wish to include a score system with an online leaderboard.
